message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a special significance to me, reflecting a considerable investment in both time and resources. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $10,000 for you to consider. This offer aims to provide a fair balance between compensating for my investment and offering you a competitive advantage through this remarkable product. I look forward to your thoughtful response.
